channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Contractors appear to be making new driveway on property and have caused major damage to pavement resulting in a big lump and large hole. Very dangerous and impassable. Close to primary school., 29th April
item.description:
Pavement outside 28 Church Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Church Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Please return and reinstate the old way mark sign for Brockhampton. It was repaired in January but the repair was unsuccessful- then a red fence appeared and signpost was removed., 29th April
item.description:
On Church Road, corner of Swindon Village park opposite Quat Goose Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Church Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: This drain is constantly blocked and does not drain when it is raining, 29th April
item.description:
As indicated on the map, the drain is on the opposite side of the road to 35 Park Place and outside Mercian Court

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Park Place, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 29th April
item.description:
